document_data.name: ''Hearth Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hearth shields''''' were [[enchanted]] [[shield]]s created by the [[dwarves]] of the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Powers: These dwarven shields possessed potent ''+3'' enchantments and shielded the wielder from magical and mundane heat, making even the deadliest blasts of steam as pleasant as a cozy hearth.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century, ''hearth shields'' were famous for their protective qualities. Some of these shields found their way into places where adventurers perished, such as the dangerous depths of [[Undermountain]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
